question: Which country’s research team has won the World Bank’s Development Marketplace award?
explanation:
As per the latest announcement from the World Bank Group and the Sexual Violence Research Initiative (SVRI), a research team of Cambodia has won the 2020 ‘Development Marketplace: Innovations to Address Gender-Based Violence’ award.
The award provides fund to the research team to implement a WhatsApp chatline that offers 24x7 support against gender-violence for female entertainment workers in Cambodia.
